name: Big Bad Wolves
description:
Big Bad Wolves is a 2D sidescroller beat them all game. You play a wild version of Little red riding hood that will deal of the wolves in the forest by herself.

Also, it's my first game. A few weeks ago I wasn't able to write a single line of code. I got restricted by my lack of programming skill a lot of times. It has many flaws but I'm proud I was able to make this game anyway.

Art and code by me, sounds found on gamesounds and freesound.
